p: Sequence reads from each treatment and replicate ( n = 2) were aligned to the combined reference assembly using Bowtie 2 (Langmead & Salzberg, 2012) and counted within RSEM v1.2.19 (Li & Dewey, 2011) using parameters recommend by the RSEM authors. Differential expression between experimental treatments and the control were compared using DESeq2 with an adjusted p‐value of ≤0.05 as the statistical cutoff (Love, Huber, & Anders, 2014). Expression levels for genes identified in previous studies to be associated with climate change stressors and/or harmful algal exposure (e.g., heat shock protein, antioxidant self‐defenses, immune functions, energy capture, and calcification) were targeted for discussion.
